name: Stellarblast
description:
Stellarblast is a fast-paced space shooter game where you have to deal with waves of various enemies with the goal of getting a new highscore.

Features:

  • Five unique enemies
  • Six asteroids
  • Three powerups
  • Full game music and Sound FX
  • Explosions (lots), camera shaking and more...

There will be updates in the future, so feedback would be greatly appreciated.

All assets are either from the Unity Asset Store or from Turbo Squid. Music is from shockwavesound.com and Relaxing music meditation. Both are royalty-free.

Game download is for Windows only (for now.

And yes, I seem to like this menu design a lot. It also features in my other game, Dino Jump.
